messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: About unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1-14-2004 4:21:37 PM Mountain Standard Time, KathrynJB@aol.com writes: I AM
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1-14-2004 4:21:37 PM Mountain Standard Time,
KathrynJB@... writes:
I >AM< glad Bob is coming.
*****************************
Isn't Bob the Spongebob singer-guy I heard so much about??? I told the kids
that story and now that we've committed to going to the conference, they've
been practicing!! All the way home (340 miles) we sang that song in different
styles and voices! See, he inspires people he hasn't even met yet!

{{{{{Joanna}}}}} Thanks for the penny story, I have one similar about my
hubby. My best friend's daughter, 14, (my practice child <g>) tells me regularly
that when she finds a penny with the head up, she can hear Mitch's voice
"heads up!" I'll be paying closer attention now :)

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
"Great spirits have always found violent opposition from mediocre minds. The
latter cannot understand it when a man does not thoughtlessly submit to
hereditary prejudices but honestly and courageously uses his intelligence." ~ Albert
Einstein


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: About unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/14/2004 1:33:33 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: We re planning on coming.  I thought if it wasn t
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/14/2004 1:33:33 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
We're planning on coming. I thought if it wasn't going to work out
for us all to come, I'd come by myself, but then I thought, I don't
think they would want me without Bob. LOL
We'll all be there.
Joanna
*******************
We would have been delighted to have you alone, but I have to tell you I >AM<
glad Bob is coming.

Bob was such an inspiration to my son Julian with music. He gave Julian that
funky capo for his guitar, and spoke to him in really cool ways about playing
and music. I'll pass along that he'll be there. Julian will be very happy.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
